resources.string: Please fill out the form below and click send. You will be asked to choose an email program to use to send the feedback. If you have encountered a problem, then it would be great if you kept the tick boxes below checked. This will provide me with additional information which might help me determine the cause of the problem.
Device Info: Android version, screen size, language capabilities.
Profile Info: Details of profile configuration.
App Auto Analysis: Self-analysis to diagnose problems.
Hi Peter,\nHere is some feedback on\u0020
Choose email app to send feedback
